TopicTitle: will we ever have a new solar system ?

Articles.Content:
hello

I was wondering if one day Squad will add a new solar system within a distance of a few light years from Kerbol, of course they'll also have to add more efficient engines to make us able to go there ?

I am statisfied that we will not have a new solar system. But we don't need one. We have enough content in the game with the current plaanets, but they should be more interesting. And awesome. And the game should generate a need for having to look around.

This suggestion has been made so often that it has earned a place on our What Not To Suggest list. The most recent official word is that there are no plans for other solar systems.

Sorry cdez, going to close this one up.
